// From: Spawns/PlayerSpawn.zs
// @DoomEdNum: 15000
class RC_PlayerSpawn : Actor
{
    int user_team;
    int user_spawn_priority;
    string user_spawn_id;
    
    Default
    {
        +NOBLOCKMAP
        +NOGRAVITY
        +NOTONAUTOMAP
        +INVISIBLE
        Radius 16;
        Height 56;
        
        //$Category "Realm Chasers/Spawns"
        //$Title "Player Spawn Point"
        //$Color 1  // Blue
        //$NotAngled
    }
    
    States
    {
    Spawn:
        TNT1 A -1;
        Stop;
    }
}
